content.prompt: Which of the following best explains the changes in wages for unskilled laborers indicated by the data in the table?

choices.label: Migration from Europe to colonies in the New World
Population growth in a relatively stagnant economy
Increased competition between private firms and state enterprises for unskilled labor
The increased ability of laborers to organize and act collectively

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
